title: Barra the new sonobuoy
brief_description: A new development in anti-submarine sensors, the sonobuoy, is dropped from anti-submarine aircraft and automatically anchored. Its range and accuracy is extremely good and the Barra sonobuoy is manufactured entirely in Australia. No other credits available.
